Quotes.quote: Hard choices, easy life. Easy choices, hard life
Quotes.author: Jerzy Gregorek

Quotes.quote: It’s easier to change yourself than to change the world
Quotes.author: Naval

Quotes.quote: They tried to bury us they didn't know we were seeds.
Quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

Quotes.quote: You don’t rise to the level of the competition. You fall to the level of your training
Quotes.author: Archilochus

Quotes.quote: I took that personally
Quotes.author: Michael Jordan

Quotes.quote: Execution is worshipped
Quotes.author: Eric Thomas

Quotes.quote: Pressure, nah. Fam, this is just playing ball. Pressure is the homeless man, who doesn't know where his next meal is coming from. Pressure is the single mom, who is trying to scuffle and pay her rent.
Quotes.author: Damian Lillard

Quotes.quote: The whole future lies in uncertainty: live immediately.
Quotes.author: Seneca

Quotes.quote: When you want to succeed as bad as you want to breathe, then you'll be successful.
Quotes.author: Eric Thomas

Quotes.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
Quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

Quotes.quote: If you are insecure, guess what? The rest of the world is, too. Do not overestimate the competition and underestimate yourself. You are better than you think.
Quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

Quotes.quote: Tomorrow becomes never. No matter how small the task, take the first step now!
Quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

Quotes.quote: “We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
Quotes.author: Aristotle

Quotes.quote: If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door.
Quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

Quotes.quote: Focus on being productive instead of being busy.
Quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

Quotes.quote: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
Quotes.author: Thomas Edison

Quotes.quote: If you lose credibility by just admitting fault, then you didn’t have any in the first place.
Quotes.author: Fujitora (Eiichiro Oda)

Quotes.quote: If I die here, then I’m a man that could only make it this far.
Quotes.author: Roronoa Zoro (Eiichiro Oda)

Quotes.quote: You need to accept the fact that you’re not the best and have all the will to strive to be better than anyone you face.
Quotes.author: Roronoa Zoro (Eiichiro Oda)

Quotes.quote: Only those who have suffered long, can see the light within the shadows.
Quotes.author: Roronoa Zoro (Eiichiro Oda)

Quotes.quote: When I decided to follow my dream, I had already discarded my life.
Quotes.author: Roronoa Zoro (Eiichiro Oda)

Quotes.quote: Don’t try to find a reason for somebody’s love.
Quotes.author: Sengoku (Eiichiro Oda)

Quotes.quote: There is a difference in the look of the ordinary vagabond and that of a determined man.
Quotes.author: Donquixote Doflamingo (Eiichiro Oda)

Quotes.quote: Power isn’t determined by your size, but the size of your heart and dreams!
Quotes.author: Monkey D. Luffy (Eiichiro Oda)

Quotes.quote: Take the first chance that you get, because you may never get another one.
Quotes.author: Lil Wayne

Quotes.quote: Information is useless if it is not applied to something important or if you will forget it before you have a chance to apply it.
Quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

Quotes.quote: How can you move forward if you keep regretting the past.
Quotes.author: Edward Elric (Hiromu Arakawa)

Quotes.quote: It’s hard to beat a person who never gives up.
Quotes.author: Babe Ruth

Quotes.quote: If you don’t have confidence, you’ll always find a way not to win.
Quotes.author: Carl Lewis

Quotes.quote: You have to expect things of yourself before you can do them.
Quotes.author: Michael Jordan

Quotes.quote: It’s hard to beat a person who never gives up.
Quotes.author: Babe Ruth

Quotes.quote: When you win, say nothing, when you lose, say less.
Quotes.author: Paul Brown

Quotes.quote: It ain’t about how hard you can hit. It’s about how hard you can get hit, and keep moving forward.
Quotes.author: Rocky Balboa

Quotes.quote: The principle is competing against yourself. It’s about self-improvement, about being better than you were the day before.
Quotes.author: Steve Young

Quotes.quote: What you lack in talent can be made up with desire, hustle, and giving 110 percent all the time.
Quotes.author: Don Zimmer

Quotes.quote: Good is not good when better is expected.
Quotes.author: Vin Scully

Quotes.quote: Continuous effort — not strength or intelligence — is the key to unlocking our potential.
Quotes.author: Liane Cardes

Quotes.quote: Most people never run far enough on their first wind to find out they’ve got a second.
Quotes.author: William James

Quotes.quote: If you can’t outplay them, outwork them.
Quotes.author: Ben Hogan

Quotes.quote: Make sure your worst enemy doesn’t live between your own two ears.
Quotes.author: Laird Hamilton

Quotes.quote: Persistence can change failure into extraordinary achievement.
Quotes.author: Marv Levy

Quotes.quote: It’s not the will to win that matters—everyone has that. It’s the will to prepare to win that matters.
Quotes.author: Paul “Bear” Bryant

Quotes.quote: When you’ve got something to prove, there’s nothing greater than a challenge.
Quotes.author: Terry Bradshaw

Quotes.quote: There may be people that have more talent than you, but theres no excuse for anyone to work harder than you do.
Quotes.author: Derek Jeter

Quotes.quote: When you’re riding, only the race in which you’re riding is important.
Quotes.author: Bill Shoemaker

Quotes.quote: I never dream of success. I worked for it.
Quotes.author: Estee Lauder

Quotes.quote: Sometimes you win, sometimes you learn.
Quotes.author: John Maxwell

Quotes.quote: Instead of wondering when your next vacation is, maybe you should set up a life you don’t need to escape from.
Quotes.author: Seth Godin

Quotes.quote: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
Quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

Quotes.quote: The grass is greener where you water it.
Quotes.author: Neil Barringham

Quotes.quote: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or objects.
Quotes.author: Albert Einstein

Quotes.quote: Numbing the pain for a while will only make it worse when you finally feel it.
Quotes.author: Albus Dumbledore (J.K. Rowling)

Quotes.quote: A comfort zone is a beautiful place, but nothing ever grows there.
Quotes.author: Unknown

Quotes.quote: Genius is 1% inspiration, 99% perspiration.
Quotes.author: Thomas Edison

Quotes.quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
Quotes.author: Billie Jean King

Quotes.quote: Don’t live the same year 75 times and call it a life.
Quotes.author: Robin Sharma

Quotes.quote: If the plan doesn’t work, change the plan, but never the goal.
Quotes.author: Unknown

Quotes.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
Quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

Quotes.quote: It’s not whether you get knocked down; it’s whether you get up.
Quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

Quotes.quote: Gold medals aren’t really made of gold. They’re made of sweat, determination, and a hard-to-find alloy called guts.
Quotes.author: Dan Gable

Quotes.quote: Do not let what you can not do interfere with what you can do.
Quotes.author: John Wooden

Quotes.quote: If you aren’t going all the way, why go at all?
Quotes.author: Joe Namath

Quotes.quote: Excellence is the gradual result of always striving to do better.
Quotes.author: Pat Riley

Quotes.quote: Make each day your masterpiece.
Quotes.author: John Wooden
